description: [Raspberry Robin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1130) creates an elevated COM object for CMLuaUtil and uses this to set a registry value that points to the malicious LNK file during execution.(Citation: TrendMicro RaspberryRobin 2022)

external_references.description: Christopher So. (2022, December 20). Raspberry Robin Malware Targets Telecom, Governments. Retrieved May 17, 2024.
